characters.name: Rudeus Greyrat
alt_names: ルーデウス・グレイラット
characters.description:
__Height:__ 175 cm (5'9")

Rudeus is a tall, well-built, and cool-looking man. However, before his reincarnation, he was originally an overweight 34-year-old Japanese NEET who became a recluse following his high-school persecution. Because of his former life, he is careful not to get carried away and become arrogant. As a result, he is extremely self-aware and humble because he does not want to revert to his old self. He is a kind person, helping his friends and protecting his family whenever needed. Due to being capable in many fields, people have high expectations of him. His current body possesses a high affinity for magic even as a child. Rudeus is very polite to others, often making them uncomfortable.

Rudeus is one of the few people capable of using a voiceless incantation, and even rarer as a person who can use voiceless incantation with melded magics. He cannot use voiceless incantation for healing magic due to his lack of understanding in regards to how mana is manipulated to heal. A normal Magician takes at least five seconds for a simple spell, while for higher-level spells it's thirty to sixty seconds. Rudeus can do it almost instantly no matter what difficulty of the spell, with the exception of healing magic.

characters.name: Sylphiette
characters.description:
Sylphiette is [Rudeus](https://anilist.co/character/88348/Rudeus-Greyrat)' childhood friend who is part human, elf, and beast race.

~!Following the teleportation incident, during which her hair turned white from mana exhaustion, she became Princess Ariel's personal bodyguard under the alias Fitz.!~

~!She is Rudeus' first wife and gives birth to their daughter Lucy and son Sieghardt. She is one of the three goddesses Rudeus worships in his religion. A cloth stained with her virgin blood that serves as a relic for the Goddess of Love is enshrined in the basement.!~

characters.name: Norn Greyrat
alt_names: ノルン・グレイラット
characters.description: Norn Greyrat is the daughter of [Zenith Greyrat](https://anilist.co/character/179855/Zenith-Greyrat) and [Paul Greyrat](https://anilist.co/character/88347/Paul-Greyrat) and is the younger sister of [Rudeus Greyrat](https://anilist.co/character/88348) and older half-sister of [Aisha Greyrat](https://anilist.co/character/145459/Aisha-Greyrat).

characters.name: Aisha Greyrat
alt_names: アイシャ・グレイラット
characters.description: Aisha Greyrat is the daughter of [Lilia](https://anilist.co/character/179854/Lilia) and [Paul Greyrat](https://anilist.co/character/88347/Paul-Greyrat) and is the younger half-sister of [Rudeus Greyrat](https://anilist.co/character/88348/Rudeus-Greyrat) and [Norn Greyrat](https://anilist.co/character/145458/Norn-Greyrat).

characters.name: Cliff Grimoire
characters.description:
Cliff Grimoire is the Grandson of the Pope, and a friend of Rudeus. 

Cliff has a very high amount of pride, so much so that he will proudly tell people when they ask him for help. Though this trait may irk many people it cannot be said that he is arrogant since he is shown to be constantly studying to improve himself showing that he is very diligent as well. He is also very loyal to his friends, since it is shown that if he is asked for help, then that becomes his main priority

characters.name: Elinalise Dragonroad
alt_names: エリナリーゼ・ドラゴンロード
characters.description: Elinalise is a former member of Paul's party. She has an erotic nature due to her curse. She is a warrior that is good at managing monster aggro but isn't a great fighter.

characters.name: Roxy Migurdia
alt_names: ロキシー・ミグルディア
characters.description:
Roxy Migurdia is a talented mage from the Migurd race, and a former magic tutor. Because she can't use telepathy, she left her village due to feeling isolated from her peers. Unable to make a stable living as an adventurer, she became a travelling tutor and eventually becomes [Rudeus](https://anilist.co/character/88348/Rudeus-Greyrat)' teacher.

~!She is Rudeus' second wife and gives birth to their daughter Lara & Lily. She is one of the three goddesses Rudeus worships in his religion. Her panties that serves as a relic for the Goddess of Wisdom is enshrined in the basement.!~

characters.name: Paul Greyrat
alt_names: パウロ・グレイラット
characters.description: Paul Greyrat is the father of [Rudeus Greyrat](https://anilist.co/character/88348/Rudeus-Greyrat), Norn Greyrat and Aisha Greyrat. He is both a talented man that became advanced in all three sword arts at a young age and a lustful man that attracts and sleeps with many women before [Zenith](https://anilist.co/character/179855/Zenith-Greyrat) chained him down.

characters.name: Shizuka Nanahoshi
alt_names: Silent Sevenstar (サイレント・セブンスター)
characters.description:
__Light Novel Volume 9 spoiler__

~! Nanahoshi Shizuka is a Japanese girl that was saved by [Rudeus](https://anilist.co/character/88348/Rudeus-Greyrat) in his past life, but instead of reincarnating like Rudeus, she was teleported to Asura Kingdom and was saved by [Orsted](https://anilist.co/character/187382/Orsted). !~

characters.name: Pursena Adoldia
alt_names: プルセナ・アドルディア
characters.description:
Together with Linia Dedoldia they are the two troublemakers in Ranoa Magic Academy, but when it comes to fulfilling her dreams of becoming the Village Chief she will do her best. She likes eating meat.

(Source: Mushoku Tensei wiki)

characters.name: Linia Dedoldia
alt_names: リニア・デドルディア
characters.description:
Linia Dedoldia is the granddaughter of the Village Chief, Gustav, of the Doldia Tribe.

~!She later becomes the slave of Rudeus Greyrat for buying/saving her from the slave trader.!~

characters.name: Zanoba  Shirone
characters.description: Zanoba Shirone is a doll loving prince of Shirone. When he was three years old, he killed his brother, the Fourth prince, as if his brother was a doll. When he was 15 years old, he killed his wife, as if she was a doll.

characters.name: Juliette
alt_names: Child of Bazar of the Holy Steel and Lilitella of the Beautiful Snow Ridge
聖鉄のバザル と 美しき雪稜のリリテッラ の子
characters.description: Juliette is an orphaned Dwarf and slave purchased by Rudeus and Zanoba with the purpose of helping them in the making of dolls. She was acquired because she fit the criteria of being a child, a Dwarf and by being a Dwarf having dexterous hands, which is preferable in doll-making. She's wary of Rudeus to an extent because of him befitting the behaviour of a folklore individual characterised by typical traits parents tell their children to deter them.

characters.name: Ariel Asura
alt_names: アリエル・アネモイ・アスラ
Second Princess of the Asura Kingdom
characters.description: Second Princess of the Asura Kingdom. She is hardly ever seen without her two bodyguards, [Luke](https://anilist.co/character/226703) and "[Silent Fitz](https://anilist.co/character/88346)". After surviving many assassination attempts, she and her bodyguards flee to The Magic City of Sharia and enroll at  the Ranoa Magic Academy.

characters.name: Luke Notos Greyrat
alt_names: ルーク・ノトス・グレイラット
characters.description:
Luke Notos Greyrat is the second prince of the Asura kingdom Ariel Anemoi Asura's personal guardian and also holds the status of Knight. 
He's also the cousin of Rudeus Greyrat, but from another of the four different branch families in the Greyrat genus, namely the Notos family.
